ASSIGN_TAG_DESCRIPTION: Bring an NFC-token in range of your reader. Then, play the playlist you want to assign - and push the button
ERROR_NO_PLAYLIST: Start the playlist which shall be assigned
SUCCESS_ASSIGNMENT_TO: NFC Token has been assigned to
UNASSIGN_TAG_DESCRIPTION: Bring an NFC-token in range of your reader. The current assignment will be shown. Then remove the assignment
